Reviews.Title: Retractble lens is easily damaged
Reviews.Author: Scott Salley
Reviews.Content: The retractable lens stopped working within a few weeks of purchase (a few days of use) which renders the camera non-functional. We sent it in for repair/replacement and the exact same thing happened within a day of return.

Reviews.Title: Unique Features. Unmatched. Best camera still
Reviews.Author: Frank Frank "Frank"
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best! An oldie but a goodie. First off it is an unbelievable 24mm ultra wide. Can't beat that.But the amazing feature is this camera has an option to PAUSE video! Saves hours versus editing. Seems like a little feature, but virtually no other cameras have this. Perfect for real estate photos and videos. Love this classic. The price actually went UP when they stopped making them.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.5 Megapixels, 1/2.33 CCD, up to 3,648 x 2,736 JPEG resolution, AVI (MPEG-4) Movie
2.5 TFT LCD Display
Focus Type - TTL auto focus (Multi AF, Center AF, Face Detection AF)
1/1,500 - 1 sec. Shutter Speed
Auto, 80, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200 (only 3M) ISO
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NV40 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Image Stabilization Zoom (Silver)
